meanings.definition: The position or authority of an overlord.
meanings.sent1: In the kingdom, the overlordship of the ruler was unquestioned.
meanings.sent2: The overlordship of the landlord extended over all the surrounding lands.
meanings.sent3: The overlordship of the cat over the mice led to comical chase scenes.
meanings.sent4: Her overlordship of the playground made her the undisputed queen of the swings.
meanings.sent5: The overlordship of the sun in the sky was evident as it bathed everything in light.

meanings.definition: The power or control of an overlord.
meanings.sent1: The overlordship of the warlord was feared by all the villagers.
meanings.sent2: Under the overlordship of the emperor, the empire prospered.
meanings.sent3: The overlordship of the boss over the office supplies was absolute.
meanings.sent4: His overlordship of the battlefield was unchallenged as he led his army to victory.
meanings.sent5: The overlordship of the storm over the sea was evident in the crashing waves.
